pageContext.claim: “You look at San Francisco. You look at Los Angeles with the terrible homeless problem, and they're not taking care of it. But look at the streets and look what's going on. They're coming to Arizona.”
pageContext.analysis: San Francisco’s “Homeward Bound” program transports thousands of homeless per year, but there’s no evidence that an especially large of them are heading to Arizona. Moreover, Phoenix has its own affordable housing crisis.
